definition.text:
1. To make holy; to consecrate; to set apart for holy or religious use. Exodus 2 8:3
8. 1 Kings 8:6 4.

2. To devote to holy or religious exercises; to treat as sacred.
Hallow the sabbath day, to do no work therein. Jeremiah 1 7:22.

3. To reverence; to honor as sacred.
Hallowed be thy name.
